public interface LdapUserAndGroupService
extends java.io.Serializable

The interface of LDAP user services.

supportGroupStatistics

boolean supportGroupStatistics()
Returns:
true if the class supports the retrieval of statictics for groups. If false, calls to methods getGroupStatistics() and resetGroupStatistics() should throw an exception.

supportsGroupTest

boolean supportsGroupTest()
Returns:
true if the class supports testing for groups. If false, calls to method groupTest() should throw an exception.

supportsUserTest

boolean supportsUserTest()
Returns:
true if the class supports testing for users. If false, calls to method userTest() should throw an exception.

supportUserStatistics

boolean supportUserStatistics()
Returns:
true if the class supports the retrieval of statictics for users. If false, calls to methods getUserStatistics() and resetUserStatistics() should throw an exception.
